Title: Full Disclosure
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Raven Molisee, Paul Villeco, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: After defeating Jasper and Peridot, Steven has trouble telling Connie about his most recent adventure.
